sentences.sContent: If he is smarter than you ,he is great,but you are fool.
sentences.sContent_eng: If he is smarter than you ,he is great,but you are fool.
sentences.sCn: 如果他比你聪明，他就是有智慧，而你是傻瓜。

sentences.sContent: So, yes, you might have been really smart in the past, but you could be smarter, I guess, is part of the situation.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, yes, you might have been really smart in the past, but you could be smarter, I guess, is part of the situation.
sentences.sCn: 所以，是的，您也许在过去一直都很聪明，但是您本来还是可以变得更加聪明的，我想这就是一部分情况吧。

sentences.sContent: In this and all of our efforts, we intend to work smarter, not lower our standards or quality of service.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this and all of our efforts, we intend to work smarter, not lower our standards or quality of service.
sentences.sCn: 通过我们这些努力，我们想要更聪明地开展工作，而并不降低我们的标准或服务的质量。

synos.tran: 聪明的；精明的（smart的比较级）
